info.title: Skeleton Simulator
info.description: Skeleton Simulator is a simulation game created and developed by Andres Adendaal of Wireframe. In this little science experiment, take control of the skeleton's different points of articulation and see how it changes the way a human walks with those changes. You can even add another skeleton to see their funny interactions!

controls: 使用鼠标点击进行操作
instructions.howToPlay: 按照游戏内提示进行游戏，完成各种挑战任务。
